headline: American Tower Corporation Announces Tax Reporting Information for 2025 Distributions
summary: BOSTON, January 20, 2026--American Tower Corporation (NYSE: AMT) today announced year-end tax reporting information for its 2025 distributions. Stockholders are urged to consult with their personal tax advisors as to their specific tax treatment.

headline: American Tower's Quarterly Earnings Preview: What You Need to Know
summary: American Tower is slated to report its fourth-quarter results soon, and analysts forecast a single-digit rise in its bottom-line figure.
